timeline.message:
Update line endings
- This will hopefully be the last of the line ending issues some people are having

timeline.body: This needs to be cleaned up. All indents should match, also for docs we don't use spaces we use `"\t"`
timeline.bodyText: This needs to be cleaned up. All indents should match, also for docs we don't use spaces we use "\t"

+package ch.njol.skript.conditions;
+
+import org.bukkit.Material;
+
+import ch.njol.skript.Skript;
+import ch.njol.skript.aliases.ItemType;
+import ch.njol.skript.conditions.base.PropertyCondition;
+import ch.njol.skript.doc.Description;
+import ch.njol.skript.doc.Examples;
+import ch.njol.skript.doc.Name;
+import ch.njol.skript.doc.RequiredPlugins;
+
+@Name("IsInteractable")
+@Description("Checks wether or not a block is interactable")
+@Examples({"on block break:",
+			"    if event-block is interactable:",
+  			"        cancel event",
+			"        send \"You cannot break interactable blocks!\""})

timeline.body:
Bukkit API also has this method, this is not a Paper only thing. 

```suggestion
@RequiredPlugins("Minecraft 1.13+")
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
Bukkit API also has this method, this is not a Paper only thing.

Suggested change
@RequiredPlugins("Paper 1.13+")
@RequiredPlugins("Minecraft 1.13+")

Should be a space between Is and Interactable

```suggestion
@Name("Is Interactable")
```

Suggested change

public class CondIsInteractable extends PropertyCondition<ItemType> {

@Since("INSERT VERSION")
public class CondIsInteractable extends PropertyCondition<ItemType> {

+package ch.njol.skript.conditions;
+
+import org.bukkit.Material;
+
+import ch.njol.skript.Skript;
+import ch.njol.skript.aliases.ItemType;
+import ch.njol.skript.conditions.base.PropertyCondition;
+import ch.njol.skript.doc.Description;
+import ch.njol.skript.doc.Examples;
+import ch.njol.skript.doc.Name;
+import ch.njol.skript.doc.RequiredPlugins;
+
+@Name("IsInteractable")
+@Description("Checks wether or not a block is interactable")
+@Examples({"on block break:",
+			"    if event-block is interactable:",
+  			"        cancel event",
+			"        send \"You cannot break interactable blocks!\""})
+@RequiredPlugins("Paper 1.13+")
+public class CondIsInteractable extends PropertyCondition<ItemType> {

replies.bodyText: What would be added in the @SInCE(""), should I put the version after the current one?
replies.author: Ankoki-Dev

replies.bodyText: just what I did in the suggest "INSERT VERSION" (we insert the version when we release)
replies.author: ShaneBeee

timeline.body:
OH I also forgot to add, description sentences should end with a period.
```suggestion
@Description("Checks wether or not a block is interactable.")
```
timeline.bodyHTML:

timeline.message:
Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master' into master

# Conflicts:
#	src/main/java/ch/njol/skript/conditions/CondIsInteractable.java

timeline.body:
One last thing I totally forgot, this should accept multiple item types.
```suggestion
			register(CondIsInteractable.class, "interactable", "itemtypes");
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
One last thing I totally forgot, this should accept multiple item types.

Suggested change
register(CondIsInteractable.class, "interactable", "itemtype");
register(CondIsInteractable.class, "interactable", "itemtypes");
timeline.author: ShaneBeee
